provider.description: Provider to be used to connect to the router

prefix_set_name.description: Name of the prefix_set. If the prefix_set does not exist, it will be created
prefix_set_name.usage: This prefix set is created on the router, if it didn't exist before

prefix_set_list.description: List of prefixes to be added to the set.
prefix_set_list.usage: This prefix list is added / merged to the prefix set

prefix_set_action.description: Operation to be performed merge/ replace
prefix_set_action.usage: merge-mode: for an existing prefix set, by default, the given prefix-list is merged with the existing list. However, this is not inline with the CLI behaviour. in CLI, the prefix set gets redefined. replace-mode: it adds the new fields (new list - existing list) and remove obsolete fields (existing list - new list). the common fields are untouched.
